Mailing Address: c/o Central Okanagan Community GardensPO Box 24113Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Primary Contact: Becky Vien, Secretary; Phone: 250.862.8825; Email: cocg@uniserve.com
Service Details: - Works to help communities create sustainable green spaces for gardening, food production, gathering and education- Works with local governments to utilize potential garden space for local residents- Provides community gardens with access to irrigation water, compost bins, tools and information to interested gardeners at each site- The use of pesticides is restricted in accordance with the City's Pesticide BylawBallou Community Garden * Barlee Road Community Garden * DeHart Community Garden * Gibbs Road Community Garden * Hartman Road Community Garden * Lindahl Community Garden * Michaelbrook Community Garden * Oyama Community Garden * PRC Community Garden * Shannon Woods Community Garden * St. Paul Community Garden * Sutton Glen Community Garden * Westbank Towne Centre Community Garden * Willow Park Church Community Garden * Winfield Community Garden
How to Apply: For more information on each of the gardens listed above and how to rent a plot, please visit the website
Cost: There is nominal annual fee charged for each plot each season
